infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app needs access to HealthKit data to track and analyze your workout activities, including distance, duration, and pace information.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app needs to write workout data to HealthKit to keep your fitness information synchronized across devices.

plugins.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app needs access to HealthKit data to track and analyze your workout activities, including distance, duration, and pace information.
plugins.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app needs to write workout data to HealthKit to keep your fitness information synchronized across devices.
